item.title: The advocates drive Apple's Social Media Strategy
item.description:
The advocates drive Apple's Social Media Strategy

On 20th September 2013, the day Apple Inc. launched their new Smartphones - iPhone 5s and iPhone 5c. Apple lovers in New York started gathering outside the stores a stunning 14 days before the launch! Steve Jobs, Apple's founder must be smirking sitting up there in heaven.

item.title: 5 Funniest Car Videos On YouTube and #1 features former Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson!
item.description:
5 Funniest Car Videos On YouTube and #1 features former Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson!

YouTube gives us a ton of great content every single day, and car videos are certainly no exception. While there are thousands of funny videos out there dealing with cars, I've gone through and selected what I feel are some of the best available. Check them out for yourself and see if you agree.
